definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: twist, turn, grasp twisting motion (Ar. lafata twist, wring; As. lapâtu, overthrow,, Dl:HWB 382);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּלְפּׂת]] Ju Jdg 16:29 sq. acc., Samson grasped the two middle columns.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּלָּפֵת]] Ru 3:8 the man started up and twisted himself; 3 mpl. [[יִלָּֽפְתוּ]] Job 6:18 the paths of their way [i.e. of the streams] turn aside (twist, wind, with lessening force), so AV Hi De Da Bu > Ew Ol Di Siegf Du, who read Qal [[יִלְפְּתוּ]] or Pi. [[יְלַפְּתוּ]], making [[ארחות]], = caravans, subj.
